meanings.definition: The state or quality of being invisible.
meanings.sent1: The invisibleness of the ghost scared the children.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's invisibleness helped him sneak past the guards.
meanings.sent3: The magician's invisibleness trick always amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her invisibleness in the crowded room made her feel like a ghost.
meanings.sent5: The cloak of invisibleness made the thief almost impossible to catch.

meanings.definition: The ability to not be seen or detected.
meanings.sent1: The invisibleness of the spy allowed him to gather secret information.
meanings.sent2: The chameleon's invisibleness helped it blend into its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The cat's invisibleness made it the master of surprise attacks on mice.
meanings.sent4: The invisibleness of the wind made its presence known only through the rustling leaves.
meanings.sent5: The ninja's skill in invisibleness made him a formidable opponent in battle.
